# Wave plot
```{r}
x <- seq(0,20,0.01)
y <- sin(x)
sin_df <- data.frame(x,y)
head(sin_df,3)
plot(sin_df)
```
\begin{equation}
\sin^2(x) + \cos^2(x) = 1
\end{equation}
